cafes.name: Qahwah Valley Cafe
cafes.note: Yemeni coffee favorites like Sana’ani and Adani chai in a relaxed spot.

cafes.name: Charlotte Cafe
cafes.note: Cozy neighborhood café for espresso drinks, pastries, and light bites.

cafes.name: Gold Coffee
cafes.note: Bright Murray Hill coffee bar; quick grab-and-go near the clinic.

restaurants.name: Garlic New York Pizza Bar
restaurants.note: Neighborhood pizzeria known for garlicky pies and Sicilian slices.

restaurants.name: Hole in the Wall – Murray Hill
restaurants.note: Australian-inspired café/restaurant at the American Copper Buildings—brunch through dinner.

restaurants.name: Little Alley
restaurants.note: Beloved Shanghainese spot—don’t miss the soup dumplings and noodles.

restaurants.name: Lena’s Italian Kitchen (Kips Bay)
restaurants.note: Comfort Italian pastas, parm heroes, and salads—easy for takeout.

hidden_gems.name: Chelsea Market
hidden_gems.note: Iconic indoor food & retail hall—perfect for grazing and gift shopping.

hidden_gems.name: Vintage India NYC
hidden_gems.note: South Asian formalwear, kurtas, and accessories—great for special occasions.

hidden_gems.name: TTH Vintage Boutique (NoMad)
hidden_gems.note: Nonprofit vintage boutique; proceeds support programs for homeless mothers.

hidden_gems.name: Artisans of New York (Seasonal @ Bryant Park Holiday Shops)
hidden_gems.note: Glass art & gift kiosk at the Holiday Shops (typically Oct–Jan).

hidden_gems.name: Rizzoli Bookstore (NoMad)
hidden_gems.note: Gorgeous flagship bookstore for art, design, and illustrated titles.

hidden_gems.name: Vintage Thrift Shop (Gramercy)
hidden_gems.note: Nonprofit thrift with clothing, housewares, and vintage finds.

iconic.name: Edge (Hudson Yards)
iconic.note: 100-story outdoor sky deck with a glass floor and sweeping views.
